description: These are some of the more famous bear kaomojis. Some are famous characters like Winnie the Pooh and Yogi Bear while others are simply more awesome than the rest of the bear emojis on this website. The cuteness is out of this world, you cannot afford to miss out on any of these special bears. Can you find Whinnie the Pooh?   ʕ •́؈•̀ ₎ ᶘ ᵒᴥᵒᶅ ʕノ•ᴥ•ʔノ ︵ ┻━┻ ᵔᴥᵔ ଘ( ິ•ᆺ⃘• )ິଓ ᵋ₍⚬ɷ⚬₎ᵌ ˁ̡̡̡∗⁎⃙ ̫⁎⃙ˀ̡̡̡ ̩˳♡⃝ ( ິ•ᆺ⃘• )ິฅ✧ ต( ິᵒ̴̶̷̤ ﻌ ᵒ̴̶̷̤ )ິ ♬ ฅ( ̳͒•ಲ• ̳͒)♪ ᶘ ᵒ㉨ᵒᶅ ᶘ ͡°ᴥ͡°ᶅ ต( ິᵒ̴̶̷̤́ᆺ⃘ᵒ̴̶̷̤̀ )ິต
title: Famous, Special, or Just Plain Awesome Bears
